Title: DOT&Tech Toolkit
HomeWiki:
Project Description
DotNTech Toolkit is a toolkit contains a lot of controls, that you would find online in different toolkits

So, Now you don't need to add all the toolkit, just download the .dll and add it to project and use it.

Guide:

The toolkit contains following controls and converters, and others

- BooleanToVisibility Converter

- LargeText Trimmer

- String to Visibility Converter

- Themed Image Converter

- Visibility to Boolean Converter

- Link

- LinkCollection

- LinkMatchMethod

- ButtonBaseHelper

- Dialog Service

- GestureHelper

- LinkLabel

- PopUp

- RoundButton

- ToastPrompt

- LowProfileImage Loader

- LinkedClicked Controle
